title: Coward

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to Weep. It's announced to all players at the start of the night. That night, any visitors will be compelled to attack you. 3 uses.
- At night, choose to Guard. Gain powerful defense tonight. Cancel the effects of Weep if it is active.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with a random town target. If they die, another random town player becomes your target.
- If multiple players try to attack you, they will fight each other to kill you. The player with the highest attack stat will attack the other visitors, then attack you. Otherwise, the most evil player will attack all other visitors. If none apply, the attacker is chosen randomly. Your target will never fight other players to kill you.
- Upon being killed by your target, haunt any player, dealing an unstoppable attack and cleaning them.
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
- If part of the Daily Streak faction, loses its Destiny and instead wins with Daily Streaks. Additionally, you gain a powerful auto-vest.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Be killed by your target. (You lose if killed by someone else.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny

desc:
Post 4665
*"We were still exploring the area when we heard the elevator start up again. Running back, we saw someone riding it upwards, yelling down that he's was going to wait for someone to help us. Coward. He's going to be waiting forever."*
